sub_title: MD PhD EBCR MBA, Cardiothoracic Radiologist, Medical Head
summary:
Medical Head of the Department of Radiology and Nuclear Medicine at Amsterdam UMC, location De Boelelaan (VUmc).

Radiologist, specialised in cardiovascular and thoracic imaging. Also experienced in CT-guided and ultrasound-guided interventions, as well as PET-CT imaging. Actively involved in education of medical students, interns and residents. Participator in ongoing research on interstitial lung disease, pulmonary vascular disease and pulmonary oncology.
